name: AI Shooter Simulation
detailed_description:
AI Shooter Simulation is a simulation AI gun battle game.

How to Play?

Choose the number of units to generate.
Set the unit of production of blood.

Features

  • Maximum support for 50 people battle simulation.
  • Control the scale of engagement.
  • Make the best matchup scenario.
  • It is being produced firearms replacement set, the future will be mounting.
  • More roles, is in preparation.

short_description: AI Shooter Simulation is a simulation AI gun battle game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft 64bit Windows 7
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 compliant graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft 64bit Windows 7
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 compliant graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2048 MB available space
